projects.name: Cricvision
projects.description: Based on Analysing IPL Cricket Dataset using diffrent Python Libraries. The CricVision website is a comprehensive online platform designed to cater to cricket enthusiasts worldwide. It serves as a centralized hub for accessing real-time match updates, in-depth statistical analysis, interactive features, and community engagement related to the sport of cricket.

projects.name: CSD POTAL at HFCL LTD
projects.description: Develop CSD PORTAL using HTML ,CSS ,JAVASCRIPT. The Customer Service Desk (CSD) Portal is a centralized web-based platform developed by HFCL Ltd to efficiently manage and resolve customer service requests across its operations. It aims to improve customer satisfaction by providing a seamless and transparent process for handling service-related issues.

projects.name: RFID Based Locking System
projects.description: using IOT Sensor And Actuators. The RFID based locking system aims to enhance security and convenience in various applications such as homes, offices, and industrial environments. It utilizes RFID tags and readers to authenticate users and grant access through electronically controlled locks.
